response.original_title: Frost Like Ashes: Live In Omaha
response.overview: Frost Like Ashes is a Christian black metal band formed in Kansas City,  Missouri in 2001. Now located in Bismarck, North Dakota. They took an 8-year break in 2011 when this DVD was officially released but is now officially active again as of 2019. Recorded on 1 camcorder and it came out surprisingly good. 3rd release." The live footage on this DVD was shot a dark night, March 17, 2006 in Omaha, Nebraska, where they performed live alongside such acts as Psyclon Nine, Epicurean, The God Project, & Gravestorm! The event was hosted by Pitt Ripply at Club Roxbury 108th & Q St.
response.title: Frost Like Ashes: Live In Omaha
